amendment.description: Amendment provides funding for the VA to include, as part of its quarterly reports on the financial status of the Veterans Health Administration, any outstanding payments owed to contracted entities older than 60 days and a justification for the delay in payments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce then increase funds for the General Services Administration by $50,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sinema amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Sinema.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Sinema amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
